City as a Campus
An open-source platform for organizing learning communities.

Process

We run weekly sprints synced on a public Google Hangout on Fridays at 10:00 AM (US/Eastern).

Daily discussion happens on Gitter and GitHub.

Every ticket should have a priority label:

  • ★★☆—the default; start here
  • ★★★—high priority
  • ★☆☆—Siberia

Every ticket that's not directly related to the software itself should have a scope label (software issues are the default ticket scope):

  • Docs—for this site
  • Design—UI/UX, Visual Assets, Wireframes, Drawings, etc.
  • Meta—catch-all for everything else

We collect sprint tickets on milestones.

We record videos of our weekly sprint reset calls.

A project of City as a Campus
